title: New: LOVE SICK – Hope
body:
Scottish duo **LOVE SICK** made their mark at the end of last year with their debut single, Bullet, and are hitting the ground running in 2017 with new track, _Hope_.

Another slice of radio ready pop, it manages to combine the ‘cooler’ elements of the likes of Purity Ring or Grimes, with the more commercial, hook based songwriting. Check it out below.
